entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
